repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition is a group organized to help the local unions of Tompkins and Cortland Counties (and surrounding area) as they work to make the workplace better.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Photographs #6185 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6185: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Records 6185 PUBS: Tompkins Cortland Labor Coalition Publications 6185/001: Tompkins County Labor Coalition Health and Safety Topical Files
